name: workspace
description: The workspace to which this project belongs.

description: The name of the project.

name: sprints
description: The set of sprints that organize tasks within the project.

name: name
description: The name of the sprint, which must be unique within the project.

name: startDate
description: The starting date of the sprint.

name: endDate
description: The ending date of the sprint.

name: user
description: The user assigned as a member of the workspace or project.

name: role
description: The role of the user in the workspace or project (admin or member).

name: joinedAt
description: The date and time when the user joined the workspace or project.

name: project
description: The project that this task belongs to.

name: sprint
description: The sprint within the project that this task is associated with.

name: title
description: The title of the task.

name: description
description: A detailed description of the task.

name: priority
type: String (enum: low, medium, high, default: medium)
description: The priority level of the task (low, medium, or high).

name: status
type: String (enum: pending, in-progress, completed, default: pending)
description: The current status of the task.

name: dueDate
description: The deadline by which the task should be completed.

name: owner
description: The user who owns or is primarily responsible for this task.

name: assignee
description: The user assigned to complete the task.

name: completed
description: Indicates whether the task has been completed.

name: comments
description: The list of comments associated with this task.

name: user
description: The user who wrote the comment.

name: content
description: The actual text content of the comment.

name: name
description: The full name of the user.

name: email
description: The unique email address of the user.

name: password
description: The password hash for user authentication.
